text:

text:

text:
Yo Topper! This is way too hard for me to write but hereâ€™s an attempt...

One of my lifelines at IITK right from the first semester. Weâ€™re similar in so many ways. Both clueless, lost and trying to find our way around. Youâ€™re the nicest, sweetest and most genuine person Iâ€™ve met at this place. Iâ€™m so glad I met you.

Still, remember your idiotic smile after topping the ECO101 end sem.

How many times have we cribbed and cried about everything under the sun - internships, projects, assignments, courses, quizzes, mid-semester exams, placements, research, end-semester exams and the mere possibility of the dreaded B grade which eventually did end up coming?

I've survived so much only because of you. You've lifted me up in my lowest moments. Youâ€™ve played a big role in what I am today. Iâ€™m eternally grateful to you for everything youâ€™ve ever done.

Iâ€™m sorry for that email incident in COM. And Iâ€™m still mad at you for ditching me for Vasundhara after agreeing to be my partner in 203.

And that lizard which scared Yatin and you out of your room. LOL!!

K, thereâ€™s so much to write about you over four years but I guess Iâ€™m going to stop here for now.

Youâ€™re waaayy stronger than you think you are.
God Bless You!

See you at Microsoft!

Love love love you <3
